content.question: The constitution of Weimar Germany helped to undermine the republican form of government by

choices.label: providing for rule by a single individual in cases of national emergency
favoring the Left over the Right in the political spectrum
committing Germany to support all decisions made by the World Court
denying some citizens the basic civil rights of a modem democracy
using complicated legal language that few people could understand

content.answer: providing for rule by a single individual in cases of national emergency
